p: James Love of Knowledge Ecology International predicted “Brazil and Thailand’s large expansion of their market for generic versions of Efavirenz, will promote reduced prices, eventually reaching less than $0.24 per day” [ 10]. Love also added, “Brazil should set up a system of collective management of intellectual property rights and extend a compulsory license for all prescription medicines, not only for AIDS but also for other important health problems like diabetes, cancer, or heart disease.”
